objects.text:
• Ultra HD 4K QLED Display
• Dolby Audio with 34W Speakers
• 120Hz Game Booster Technology

product_details.name: Xiaomi 138 cm (55 inch) FX Pro QLED Ultra HD 4K Smart Fire TV L55MB-FPIN
product_details.description:
- Brand: Xiaomi.
- Model: L55MB-FPIN.
- Model Name: L55MB-FPIN.
- Model Year: 2025.
- Product Dimensions: 7.6 x 122.6 x 71.7 cm; 9.1 kg.
- Memory Storage Capacity: 32 GB.
- Ram Memory Installed Size: 2 GB.
- Operating System: Fire OS 8.
- Graphics Coprocessor: Mali-G52 MC1.
- Response Time: 6.5 Milliseconds.
- Resolution: 3840x2160 Pixels.
- Special Features: Built-In Speaker, Chromecast, Bezel-Less Design, Wide Viewing Angle, Eye Comfort Mode.
- Mounting Hardware: Stand, User Manual, Warranty Card, Remote Control, Power Cable.
- Number of items: 7.
- Remote Control Description: One Click Prime, Netflix, Youtube | Alexa Voice Assistant.
- Remote control technology: Bluetooth.
- Display Technology: QLED.
- Standing screen display size: 55 Inches.
- Display Type: HDR 10+.
- Viewing Angle: 178 Degrees.
- Image Aspect Ratio: 16:09.
- Audio input compatible with the item: Earphone Out.
- Audio output mode: Surround.
- Supported audio formats: Dolby/DTS/MP3/FLAC/AAC/OGG/ADPCM/OPUS.
- Speaker Surround Sound Channel Configuration: Dolby Audio.
- Speakers Maximum Output Power: 34 Watts.
- Audio Wattage: 34 Watts.
- Voltage: 130 Volts.
- Power Source: AC.
- Batteries Included: Yes.
- Batteries Required: Yes.
- Battery cell composition: Alkaline.
- Refresh Rate: 60 Hz.
- Total USB ports: 2.
- Connector Type: Wi-Fi, USB, Ethernet, HDMI.
- Mounting Type: Wall Mount & Table Mount.
- Actual viewing angle: 178 Degrees.
- Includes Rechargeable Battery: No.
- Includes remote: Yes.
- Supports Bluetooth Technology: Yes.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Item Weight: 9 kg 100 g.
- Importer: TTE Electronics India Private Limited, Vikruthamala Village, Papanaidupeta Post, Yerpedu Mandal, Tirupati, Vikruthamala Village, Chitt oor, Andhra Pradesh, 5179.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 7.6 x 122.6 x 71.7 Centimeters.
- Net Quantity: 1 Piece.
- Generic Name: Television.

banner_details:
The banner is a promotional layout featuring a tech product with a split design. The left half contains multiple text layers like **tagline**, **heading**, **description**, **subheading**, **price**, **original_price**, **cta**, and **disclaimer**. These sections highlight the urgency of the offer, the product name and features, the discounted price, and a call-to-action button with a red rectangular shape (**cta_button**). The right half displays the **product_image**, scaled to fit the space. The background uses a gradient transitioning from deep navy to dark grey with subtle digital-pattern overlays and red radial glow effects.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: #0D1117 → #1C2331
- Highlight Red: #FF4D4D
- Text White: #FFFFFF
- Accent Grey: #9EAEC7
product_color: The product image features a vivid and luxurious color palette designed to emphasize the premium QLED display. Dominant colors include fiery orange (#F26522), rich deep purple (#3C1A44), shimmering teal blue (#00B3B3), and metallic gold (#D9A441). These hues blend seamlessly in the flower-like visual, adding depth and vibrance. Bright highlights on the water droplets and petals create a glossy, high-definition effect, emphasizing realism and HDR brilliance. The black frame (#000000) and white text (#FFFFFF) contrast boldly against the colorful background, ensuring readability. This palette evokes high-end technology and visual splendor—ideal for an eye-catching, immersive advertisement banner.
